fields.headline: Sport in brief
fields.bodyText: Bowls The veteran English international Andy Thomson sprang a surprise at the Bupa Open in Blackpool yesterday when he defeated the defending champion and No1 seed David Gourlay in straight sets, 11-4, 9-1. The No2 seed Alex Mar shall of Scotland lost a sudden-death shootout to Jason Greenslade of Wales. Ron Wyllie Taekwondo Doncaster's Sarah Stevenson, 18, is the new world middleweight champion after winning the competition in Seoul, South Korea. Ice Hockey Bracknell Bees have signed the Canadian forward Eric Bertrand, 26. He has played 15 NHL games over the past two seasons, latterly for the Montreal Canadiens.
